history.proof: intros. srun best use: sss_progress_compute, sss_progress_compute_trans.

exceptions.exn: In environment instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code st1, st2, st3 : state H : P // st1 -+> st2 H0 : P // st2 -+> st3 Unable to unify "exists k : nat, ?M1446//?M1447-[k]->?M1449" with "exists k : nat, 0 < k /\\ P//st1-[k]->st3".

original: intros. intros H1 H2. apply sss_compute_trans with st2. - apply sss_progress_compute with st2. apply H1. - apply H2.
